verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.mining.com/web/south32-to-place-mozal-under-care-and-maintenance-in-2026/. Mozal Aluminium is the largest industrial employer in Mozambique and is located just west of the capital, Maputo

web_search_companies.notes: South32 holds a 63.7% stake in Mozal Aluminium, with other shareholders including Mitsubishi Corporation (25%), Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa (3.9%), and the Government of Mozambique.
